    • Method Detail

      • getTechDiscountRate

        public double getTechDiscountRate()
        Description copied from class: Minister
        Minister by default does not provide tech discount rate therefore this method always returns 1.

        This behavior may be overridden in a sub-class

        Overrides:
        getTechDiscountRate in class Minister
        Returns:
        tech discount rate equals to 1 - (intelligence + experience) / 1500

      • collectSciencePoints

        public int collectSciencePoints​(City city)
        Description copied from class: Minister
        Collect science points from a city amount collected = (city population + minister experience + minister intelligence) * (# of universities + 1) * 0.2
        Overrides:
        collectSciencePoints in class Minister
        Parameters:
        city - to collect science points from
        Returns:
        1.5 times the amount collected by other types of minister

        Returns:
